abilities.name: chlorophyll
abilities.effect:
This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

abilities.name: overgrow
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

abilities.name: solar-power
abilities.effect: During strong sunlight, this Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack but takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn.
